verses.roman:
hena-kāle gela rājā uḍiyā mārite
sanātane kahe,--tumi cala mora sāthe

synonyms: hena-kāle—at this time; gela—went; rājā—the King; uḍiyā mārite—to attack the Orissa province; sanātane kahe—he said to Sanātana Gosvāmī; tumi cala—you come; mora sāthe—along with me.
translation: At this time, the Nawab was going to attack the province of Orissa, and he told Sanātana Gosvāmī, "Come along with me."

purport.content: Hussain Shah attacked the province of Orissa in 1424 Śakābda Era. At that time he conquered the feudal princes of neighboring Orissa.
